name: Soffit/Eave Material
template name: Soffit Works - Canopy 1 Soffit Eave Install - Soffit/Eave Material

name: Material Inspection:
Walnut Brown Mondoclad panels
20 x 3mm panel stiffeners
10g a2/70 stainless screw fixings into z angles
120mm 0.90mm top hat supports
20 x 20 x 3mm SHS AL.6063-t5 stiffeners
25x25x3mm alumninium 6063-t5 angle corner stiffeners
Isolation tape used between gal top hat and z angles
Approved structural caulking
Insulation Sarking
Installation:
Mondcload Panels installed
Panel Stifferners installed at 600mm centres using approved Struc. Silicone
Stainless screws installed at 300mm centres z angle and tophat
Additional Top Hat supports installed at 1.2m centres apart
Max. 1200mm span between top hat restarints
Droppers from purlins to facilitate max top hat spans
Minimum 6mm structural silicone thickness for stiffener
10g a2/70 stainless screw fixings into z angles 300mm c/c screw spacing to top hat
10g a2/70 stainless screw fixings into z angles and mondoclad on the side
Panel Stifferners installed at 600mm centres using approved Struc. Silicone
Minimum 6mm structural silicone thickness for stiffener
5mm offset from end of stiffener to cassette edge
Snug fit screw connection in long Z angle
Horizontal slot in long Z angle, ±3mm, provide horizontal slots in line with snug fit frixing Horizontal slot in short Z angle ±3mm
Oversized hole in long Z angle, +3mm
Spacing between each modoclad to by typical 12mm
Short Z angle to be installed on top of long Z angle
Insulation Sarking installed and taped where cut
Area clean and free of debris
Materials in good condition
Signoffs
Inspected and accepted by S&H authorised representative as complying with relevant Australian Standard and legislation
Checked and Signed by:
Inspected and accepted by Authorized Representative
Checked and Signed by:
Reinspection requested by Subcontractor
Date:
Non-Conforming Items to be Rectified
Follow up work satisfactorily
Site Supervisor:
All items have been completed and demonstrated satisfactorily

template name: Soffit Works - Canopy 2 Soffit Eave Install - Soffit/Eave Material

name: Material Inspection:
Walnut Brown Mondoclad panels
50mm 1.15BMT Top Hat
MAXIjamb 92mm Bracket Rondo 21
Isolation tape used between gal top hat and z angles
20 x 3mm panel stiffeners
20 x 20 x 3mm SHS AL.6063-t5 stiffeners
25 x 25 x 3mm 90° angle AL.6063-t5 corner stiffeners
#14G Hex HD screws for tophat screws
10g a2/70 stainless steel screw for cassette
12g class 3 tek screws into frame work
Rondo 64 x 36mm 1.15BMT stud for dropper stud, diagonal brace, continuous stud rail
Approved structural silicone
Insulation Sarking
Installation:
Insulation Sarking installed and taped where cut
Top hat at panel short edge
Max 1200mm Spacing for Stud Rail
Max 1200mm Spacing for top hat to continuous stud rail
Max 1700mm span length for 50mm top hat
Additional Top Hat supports installed at 1.2m centres apart
Max Plenum Depth 700mm
Max. 1200mm span between top hat restarints
Droppers from purlins to facilitate max top hat spans
3 x 12G Hex HD screws for diagonal brace and dropper stud
2 x 14G Hex HD screws to each continuous stud rail and dropper stud
2 x 14G Hex HD screws to each continuous stud rail 50mm top hat
2 x 12G Hex HD screws to MAXIjamb 92mm bracket and diagonal brace
2 x 12G Hex HD screws to MAXIjamb 92mm bracket and purlin
3 x 12g c3 tek screw at either end of dropper
10g a2/70 stainless screw fixings into z angles 300mm c/c screw spacing to top hat
10g a2/70 stainless screw fixings into z angles and mondoclad on the side
Panel Stifferners installed at 600mm centres using approved Struc. Silicone
Minimum 6mm structural silicone thickness for stiffener
5mm offset from end of stiffener to cassette edge
Snug fit screw connection in long Z angle
Horizontal slot in long Z angle, ±3mm, provide horizontal slots in line with snug fit frixing Horizontal slot in short Z angle ±3mm
Oversized hole in long Z angle, +3mm
Spacing between each modoclad to by typical 12mm
Short Z angle to be installed on top of long Z angle
Area clean and free of debris
Materials in good condition
Signoffs
Inspected and accepted by S&H authorised representative as complying with relevant Australian Standard and legislation
